name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Python Engineer with over 10 years of experience in architecting and delivering backend systems, specializing in financial platforms and cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **Python** (including **Django**, **Django REST Framework**, **Flask**), and skilled in developing scalable services and high-performing **RESTful APIs**. Demonstrated expertise with message brokers like **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and orchestration tools such as **Celery** and **gRPC**. Experienced in using monitoring and observability tools like **Datadog**, **Prometheus**, and **Sentry**. Adept in database management with **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and OLAP systems including **StarRocks**, **ClickHouse**, and **Redshift**. Strong background in implementing CI/CD practices and utilizing cloud services like **AWS** and **Kubernetes**. Proven ability to deliver impactful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust backend solutions using **Python** and **Django REST Framework** to enhance document automation and user onboarding processes, achieving a **30% decrease** in workflow time.
Engineered efficient asynchronous processing with **Celery** and **Redis** for financial transactions, resulting in the capability to handle up to **5000 requests** per minute.
Utilized **Terraform** for infrastructure as code to deploy microservices on **Azure App Services**, improving cloud operational efficiency by **25%**.
Constructed and optimized data pipelines for regulatory compliance using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring a **99.9%** accuracy in data flow.
Conducted comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to implement secure authentication, supporting user scalability to over **100,000** accounts.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to tackle system integration issues and ensure compliance, successfully overseeing release strategies for **4 major updates** annually.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests, improving processing time by **30%**.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments, reducing deployment time by **50%**.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow, increasing data accuracy by **20%**.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing authentication and securing access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management, leading to a **95%** success rate in project delivery.

• Developed backend services using **Python** and **PostgreSQL** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, enhancing trading operations by 30%.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, delivering up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams, creating **RESTful APIs** and handling **WebSocket** channels, ensuring smooth user interactions with a response time under **200ms**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements such as MiFID II and GDPR while maintaining internal data security protocols, leading to a 100% pass rate in audits.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes and reducing bugs in production by 25%.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and achieving a 50% increase in process efficiency.
• Engaged in continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) practices, significantly reducing deployment time from **2 hours** to under **15 minutes**.
